maqras.text: Subhana Al-Ladhi 'Asra Bi`abdihi Laylaan Mina Al-Masjidi Al-Harami 'Ila Al-Masjidi Al-'Aqsa Al-Ladhi Barakna Hawlahu Linuriyahu Min 'Ayatina 'Innahu Huwa As-Sami`u Al-Basiru
Wa 'Atayna Musa Al-Kitaba Wa Ja`alnahu Hudaan Libani 'Isra'ila 'Alla Tattakhidhu Min Duni Wa Kilaan
Dhurriyata Man Hamalna Ma`a Nuhin 'Innahu Kana `Abdaan Shakuraan
Wa Qađayna 'Ila Bani 'Isra'ila Fi Al-Kitabi Latufsidunna Fi Al-'Arđi Marratayni Wa Lata`lunna `Uluwaan Kabiraan
Fa'idha Ja'a Wa`du 'Ulahuma Ba`athna `Alaykum `Ibadaan Lana 'Uli Ba'sin Shadidin Fajasu Khilala Ad-Diyari Wa Kana Wa`daan Maf`ulaan
Thumma Radadna Lakumu Al-Karrata `Alayhim Wa 'Amdadnakum Bi'amwalin Wa Banina Wa Ja`alnakum 'Akthara Nafiraan
In 'Ahsantum 'Ahsantum Li'nfusikum Wa 'In 'Asa'tum Falaha Fa'idha Ja'a Wa`du Al-'Akhirati Liyasu'u Wujuhakum Wa Liyadkhulu Al-Masjida Kama Dakhaluhu 'Awwala Marratin Wa Liyutabbiru Ma `Alaw Tatbiraan
Asa Rabbukum 'An Yarhamakum Wa 'In `Udtum `Udna Wa Ja`alna Jahannama Lilkafirina Hasiraan
Inna Hadha Al-Qur'ana Yahdi Lillati Hiya 'Aqwamu Wa Yubashiru Al-Mu'uminina Al-Ladhina Ya`maluna As-Salihati 'Anna Lahum 'Ajraan Kabiraan
Wa 'Anna Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati 'A`tadna Lahum `Adhabaan 'Alimaan
Wa Yad`u Al-'Insanu Bish-Sharri Du`a'ahu Bil-Khayri Wa Kana Al-'Insanu `Ajulaan

Wa Ja`alna Al-Layla Wa An-Nahara 'Ayatayni Famahawna 'Ayata Al-Layli Wa Ja`alna 'Ayata An-Nahari Mubsiratan Litabtaghu Fađlaan Min Rabbikum Wa Lita`lamu `Adada As-Sinina Wa Al-Hisaba Wa Kulla Shay'in Fassalnahu Tafsilaan
Wa Kulla 'Insanin 'Alzamnahu Ta'irahu Fi `Unuqihi Wa Nukhriju Lahu Yawma Al-Qiyamati Kitabaan Yalqahu Manshuraan
Iqra' Kitabaka Kafa Binafsika Al-Yawma `Alayka Hasibaan
Mani Ahtada Fa'innama Yahtadi Linafsihi Wa Man Đalla Fa'innama Yađillu `Alayha Wa La Taziru Waziratun Wizra 'Ukhra Wa Ma Kunna Mu`adhibina Hatta Nab`atha Rasulaan
Wa 'Idha 'Aradna 'An Nuhlika Qaryatan 'Amarna Mutrafiha Fafasaqu Fiha Fahaqqa `Alayha Al-Qawlu Fadammarnaha Tadmiraan
Wa Kam 'Ahlakna Mina Al-Quruni Min Ba`di Nuhin Wa Kafa Birabbika Bidhunubi `Ibadihi Khabiraan Basiraan
Man Kana Yuridu Al-`Ajilata `Ajjalna Lahu Fiha Ma Nasha'u Liman Nuridu Thumma Ja`alna Lahu Jahannama Yaslaha Madhmumaan Madhuraan
Wa Man 'Arada Al-'Akhirata Wa Sa`a Laha Sa`yaha Wa Huwa Mu'uminun Fa'ula'ika Kana Sa`yuhum Mashkuraan
Kullaan Numiddu Ha'uula' Wa Ha'uula' Min `Ata'i Rabbika Wa Ma Kana `Ata'u Rabbika Mahzuraan
Anzur Kayfa Fađđalna Ba`đahum `Ala Ba`đin Wa Lal'akhiratu 'Akbaru Darajatin Wa 'Akbaru Tafđilaan
La Taj`al Ma`a Allahi 'Ilahaan 'Akhara Fataq`uda Madhmumaan Makhdhulaan
